Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Howard
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Howard. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Howard. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#151 Sheridan

#22 Clark

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
